ygData.subject: RE: Dual Bard Invisibility Question
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing to consider is that mobs have a refresh rate on aggro.  If you get REAL lucky you can run by a normally aggro mob with getting attacked. I have
ygData.messageBody:
One thing to consider is that mobs have a 'refresh rate' on aggro. If you
get REAL lucky you can run by a normally aggro mob with getting attacked. I
have done this with LDC's & Freeport Milita. So what may have happened is
you got in-sync with the mob aggro refresh with the song weaving. Too bad
there is no way to time this to really have some fun :)

Rokenn


>From: <kim@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dual Bard Invisibility Question
>Date: Tue, 4 Jan 2000 13:15:04 -0500 (EST)
>
>On Tue, 4 Jan 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
> >
> > I noticed this two, even more strangely I was able to weave healing and
> > invis and still not be seen. It could be there are some mobs which
>cannot
> > see thru invis that can see you when the song pulses. I was definitely
>able
> > healing without activating it. The mob I tested on was a gnoll reaver
>in
>
>Are you sure? You become visible when you start a new song,
>so you can't weave Hymn and invis and stay invisible.
>
>Dunno about the other case (two bards in party, singing Hymn
>and invis). I never tested that.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
